title: Gorgeous 55+ 1 Bedroom Apt Home Available Now at The Legends!
posting_body: ['Take a Video Tour Today', '> Check out the video walkthroughs of our community’s amenities and apartment homes!', 'If you are interested in an in-person tour, feel free to call or email us at any time.', 'Please use the link in this ad to view our video tours & options to contact us directly.', 'At The Legends of Columbia Heights Senior Apartments, our residents enjoy the comforts of maintenance-free living along with the convenience of an outstanding location.', 'Our one, two and three bedroom apartment homes have unbeatable amenities with in-home washers and dryers, granite countertops, spacious 9-foot ceilings, and a private balcony or patio.', 'With our convenient location off University Avenue – just steps from Huset Park and John Murzyn Hall Senior Center, which features weekly activities including fitness classes, card games, planned outings, there is no better place than The Legends to call your new home!', 'Hurry and reserve your new home today!', 'Community Amenities Include:', '- Open & Spacious Floor Plans', '- Gorgeous Community Room with Full Kitchen', '- Full-Size Washer & Dryer', 'In EVERY Home!', '- Large Walk-In Closet(s)', '- Separate Dining & Living Room Areas', '- Guest-Suite', '- Additional Storage Available', 'We are a pet friendly community!', 'Dogs & cats welcome!', '*Comfortable living does not have to be high dollar.', 'The Legends of Columbia Heights is a 55 or better senior community and participates in an affordable housing program.', 'Household income & student status limitations apply: 1 Occupant: $49,320 | 2', 'Occupants: $56,340 | 3', 'Occupants: $63,360 | 4 Occupants: $70,380.', 'To maintain the integrity of the community; credit, rental & public record background checks are conducted on all applicants.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-4:30PM', 'Call today to schedule your tour:', 'show contact info', 'Legends of Columbia Heights', '3700 Huset Parkway', 'Columbia Heights, MN, 55421', '<URL>', '*Some Restrictions May Apply.', '0uHiVKkgTkH2']
